rows.label: qst200412_0010
rows.name: Is that the doctor and the loan shark?

rows.label: qst200412_0020
rows.name: It would appear so.

rows.label: qst200412_0030
rows.name: It seems the rumors were true...

rows.label: qst200412_0040
rows.name:
A doctor, whose duty is to save lives, is
causing suffering to the townspeople.

rows.label: qst200412_0050
rows.name: This is unforgivable...

rows.label: qst200412_0060
rows.name: Vasara?

rows.label: qst200412_0070
rows.name:
So, what about that woman? Were
you able to collect the money?

rows.label: qst200412_0080
rows.name:
Ah, there was an interruption, but I've
taken measures. It should be settled soon.

rows.label: qst200412_0090
rows.name: Yes... it will be settled.

rows.label: qst200412_0100
rows.name: Vasara.

rows.label: qst200412_0110
rows.name: Did you kill them?

rows.label: qst200412_0120
rows.name: No... They are merely unconscious.

rows.label: qst200412_0130
rows.name:
If we restrain them, the Superbian
soldiers will capture them later.

rows.label: qst200412_0140
rows.name:
...This time it worked out, but
it is dangerous to act alone.

rows.label: qst200412_0150
rows.name:
That's right. It would have
been bad if they had allies.

rows.label: qst200412_0160
rows.name:
...I judged that there was
no better time to strike.

rows.label: qst200412_0170
rows.name:
If I had wasted time observing the
situation and allowed them to escape...

rows.label: qst200412_0180
rows.name:
many more innocent people
would have shed tears...

rows.label: qst200412_0190
rows.name:
That may be so, but Hana and
others have teamwork, mo.

rows.label: qst200412_0200
rows.name: ...Vasara.

rows.label: qst200412_0210
rows.name:
Why are you so fixated
on vanquishing evil?

rows.label: qst200412_0220
rows.name:
...In this world, there is evil
that the law cannot judge.

rows.label: qst200412_0230
rows.name:
In the shadow of that evil, there are people
who continue to shed tears and blood.

rows.label: qst200412_0240
rows.name: When I was granted a new life...

rows.label: qst200412_0250
rows.name:
I felt that I should use this power
for the sake of such weak people.

rows.label: qst200412_0260
rows.name:
To punish all the evil in this world...
that is my reason for living.

rows.label: qst200412_0270
rows.name:
To vanquish all evil... That's
quite a goal you have, mo.

rows.label: qst200412_0280
rows.name:
I see. Your strength
comes from that resolve.

rows.label: qst200412_0290
rows.name: Anyway, we're your allies, right?

rows.label: qst200412_0300
rows.name: You should rely on us more.

rows.label: qst200412_0310
rows.name: ...I shall endeavor to do so.

rows.label: qst200412_0320
rows.name:
Well, the case is solved now, so
no need to get so worked up.

rows.label: qst200412_0330
rows.name: No, it is not yet over.

rows.label: qst200412_0340
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst200412_0350
rows.name:
We have defeated the doctor and loan shark, but
many criminals involved are still at large.

rows.label: qst200412_0360
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst200412_0370
rows.name:
Then we should find their
trails immediately.

rows.label: qst200412_0380
rows.name: That will not be necessary.

rows.label: qst200412_0390
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst200412_0400
rows.name: Why not?

rows.label: qst200412_0410
rows.name: This is my duty.

rows.label: qst200412_0420
rows.name:
There is no need to trouble
you all any further.

rows.label: qst200412_0430
rows.name: Leave the rest to me.

rows.label: qst200412_0440
rows.name: Um, Vasara-san?

rows.label: qst200412_0450
rows.name: ...And he's gone.

rows.label: qst200412_0460
rows.name:
Sheesh, it's like he didn't
hear a word I just said...
